string.value: In Lith Harbor, you meet a heavily-bearded crewmember of The Victoria called Teo. He says he has some #bWeird Medicine#k but he isn't willing to give it up for free. Instead he says he'll trade it for a #bsparkling rock#k. He seems like he knows Maya pretty well, yet he still wants a favor first, knowing how sick Maya is? Creep. Anyway, to get the #bsparkling rock#k, you should head to Perion and talk to #rSophia#k, the daughter of the owner of the department store there.
You met Sophia. To make the sparkling rock, she said she needs #bArcon's blood#k.
Well, I do happen to have some #b#t4031006##k, but I can't give it to you for free. Hmm, if you get me a #b#t4031004##k, though, I may reconsider...meaning I would be willing to trade with you.

Want to know how to get that stone? I wouldn't be asking for your help if I knew! Here's the deal, head over to the department store in #b#m102000000##k, ask for the daughter of the owner, #r#p1022100##k, and ask her about its whereabouts. She may have a clue...

Please don't tell me you have no idea how to get to #m102000000#! Ok fine! Take the exit to the right out of the harbor, go through #m103000000# to the north, and then keep going east until you reach #m102000000#.

Didn't get the #b#t4031004##k yet? Oh well, it's not the easiest things to acquire. Ah, so gorgeous when it shines like a star... Hurry and go see #r#p1022100##k at the department store in #b#m102000000##k.
